text: The #FDA issued an EUA for #chloroquine & #hydroxychloroquine to treat #COVID19. Both drugs should be administered with caution in patients with a #G6PD deficiency, a genetic disorder affecting 1:10 African American males. See Admera’s note on the subject https://t.co/DKlVKI2tMA https://t.co/bxU08t3Ef4
